root.name: Mecho Wars
root.description: Mecho Wars is a turn-based strategy game for the iPhone in the vein of Nintendo's Advance Wars series. It follows the same basic structure of having two teams on the battlefield with buildings to take over and use to strengthen your faction. The story focuses on the war between the Winged Crusade and the Landians. It has been confirmed that it will be ported to the Wii Shop and DSiWare at some point. Â On January 10th, 2012, it was released on the Playstation Network as a Mini for both PS3 and PSP. Playstation Plus members can download it free of charge.
